section.p: Beginning with this release, Docker images for are no longer available on Docker Hub. The images are included in self-installing archive files that are available for download from . Likewise, the RPM packages required for installations and upgrades are no longer available from repositories on the internet, and must be downloaded. However, the Docker images and RPM packages for previous releases are still available from Docker Hub and repositories, respectively, and will be available in those locations for as long as supports the releases.
